title: Igor Syrov
text:
Igor Vladimirovich Syrov (; born 19 September 1969) is a retired <a href="Russia">Russia</a>n professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player.
Club career.
He played in the <a href="Russian%20Football%20National%20League">Russian Football National League</a> for <a href="FC%20Torpedo%20Volzhsky">FC Torpedo Volzhsky</a> in 1995.
